PRISMS-PF
=========

# Available modules


The overview below shows which PRISMS-PF installations are available per HPC-UGent Tier-2 cluster, ordered based on software version (new to old).

To start using PRISMS-PF, load one of these modules using a `module load` command like:

```shell
module load PRISMS-PF/2.2-foss-2021a
```
